main.slogan:
Transforming one sense into another,
a new way to enrich and diversify your writing.

example_0.pre: Eyes that sparkle like the stars in the night sky.
example_0.next: Eyes like the whisper of moonlight on a quiet night.

example_1.pre: A voice as soft as velvet.
example_1.next: A voice like a deep and warm sunset.

example_2.pre: Laughter like the scent of fresh grass.
example_2.next: Laughter like the refreshing taste of mint.

example_3.pre: Laughter like the sound of clear bells.
example_3.next: Laughter like a gentle spring breeze.

sentence.title: Redefine Your Sentence in New Sensations
sentence.description: Enter your sentence, and AI will transform it with new sensations. Please note that only one expression per sentence is recognized.
sentence.checkSense:
Is this an expression using the sense of

{sense}
sentence.notSense: It is not a sentence using sensory expressions. Please choose directly.
sentence.selectSense: Which sense is this expression using?

paragraph.title: Convert various sensory expressions used in the text.
paragraph.description: The AI analyzes and transforms the sensory expressions used in your writing.
